function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Communal spread of viral attacks leading to emergencies","Inadequate data security of health information","Lack of physical activity due to indoor sedentary lifestyles","High-density living and overbuilding activity may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases in densely built spaces","Failure to monitor public health and government announcements can result in non-compliance with regulations and guidelines, leading to increased risk of contagious disease propagation","Inadequate support for workers in the event of a positive covid-19 case can result in fear, stigma, and reluctance to report symptoms, leading to underreporting of cases and increased risk of transmission","Increased risk of contagion due to lack of safety measures in construction sites","Reliance on wastewater surveillance to estimate covid-19 presence and prevalence","Uncertainty in correlating sars-cov-2 rna in wastewater with covid-19 prevalence due to various factors such as excretion differences, environmental variables, and unreported cases","Potential contamination of influent and effluent water with mgv and pedv","Handling and processing of wastewater and effluent water samples","Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in untreated wastewater samples","Re-emerging zoonotic hepatitis e virus detected in the built environment","Covid-19 spread indoors","Virus droplets staying in the air","Contact surface contamination","Inadequate building design for fighting airborne viruses and maintaining healthy conditions for occupants during quarantine and stay-at-home orders","Inadequate sanitation and wastewater management in residential buildings, leading to the potential spread of viruses through sewage","Inadequate bathroom infrastructure in residential buildings for preventing virus transmission between occupants during quarantine","Viral transmission in buildings and transportation","Changes in building activities and layouts due to covid-19","Negative impact on economic progress"]}
